name: ngx-translation-extension
description: An Extension that helps the user generating translation strings, and adding them automatically to the corresponding .json files in the project directory, assuming that the user uses ngx-translate/core to localize the project that is being worked on.

commands.title: Translate selected string in an HTML file
Translate selected string in an TS (Code) file

ngx-translation-extension.autoFileModify.description: Automatically modifies transilation files that are specified in the extension settings.

ngx-translation-extension.languageFrom.description: The source language to be translated from.

ngx-translation-extension.languageTo.description: The target language to be translated to. (supports multiple targeted languages such `as ar,es,fr`)

ngx-translation-extension.googleAPIKey.description: Specify a google API key in order to add google translations to the target language. Leave empty to paste the selected text to the target translated file key as it is.

ngx-translation-extension.JSONDirectory.description: Path where to find the translation JSON Files. Example : `src/assets/i18n/`

ngx-translation-extension.TranslationWra.description: Surrounds stored key of translated string by pipe/statement etc.. $key is required for this option to work. Example : `{{'$key' | translate }}`

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
